com.daw.pms.Service.PMS

Interface LibraryService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LibraryServiceImpl

    public interface LibraryService
    Service for handle playlists or favorites.
    Since:
    7/11/23
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Daw Loph

    • Method Detail

      • getLibraries

        Result getLibraries(Long id,
                    Integer pn,
                    Integer ps,
                    String biliPlatform,
                    Integer type,
                    Integer platform)
        Get all libraries for specific platform.
        Parameters:
        id - Your user id in pms.
        pn - The page number, only used in bilibili and pms, start from 1.
        ps - The page size, only used in bilibili and pms.
        biliPlatform - The platform of bilibili, default is web, only used in bilibili.
        type - The fav lists type of bilibili, 0 means get created fav lists, 1 means get collected fav lists, only used in bilibili.
        platform - Which platform the user belongs to. 0 represents pms, 1 represents qq music, 2 represents netease cloud music, 3 represents bilibili.
        Returns:
        All libraries for specific platform, wrapped in Result DTO.

      • getDetailLibrary

        Result getDetailLibrary(String libraryId,
                        Integer pn,
                        Integer ps,
                        String keyword,
                        String order,
                        Integer range,
                        Integer type,
                        Integer platform)
        Get detail library with libraryId in platform.
        Parameters:
        libraryId - The library id.
        pn - The page number, only used in bilibili.
        ps - The page size, only used in bilibili.
        keyword - The keyword to search, only used in bilibili.
        order - The sorting order of resources of this fav list, mtime: by collected time, view: by view time, pubtime: by published time, default is mtime.
        range - The range of searching, 0: current fav list, 1: all fav lists, default is 0.
        type - 0 for created fav list, 1 for collected fav list.
        platform - Which platform the library belongs to.
        Returns:
        Detail library wrapped by Result DTO.

      • createLibrary

        Result createLibrary(Map<String,String> library,
                     Integer platform)
        Create new library.
        Parameters:
        library - A map that contains the name of library, {"name"(required): name, "intro":intro, "privacy": privacy, "cover":cover}
        platform - Which platform the library belongs to.
        Returns:
        The response of request wrapped by Result DTO.

      • updateLibrary

        Result updateLibrary(UpdateLibraryDTO library,
                     Integer platform)
        Update library.
        Parameters:
        library - UpdateLibraryDTO that contains the name of library, {"name"(required):name, "intro":intro, "cover":cover} (PMSDetailLibrary)
        platform - Which platform this library belongs to.
        Returns:
        The response of request wrapped by Result DTO.

      • deleteLibrary

        Result deleteLibrary(String libraryId,
                     Integer platform)
        Delete the library.
        Parameters:
        libraryId - The id of library, multiple libraries separated with comma.
        platform - Which platform the library belongs to.
        Returns:
        The response of request wrapped by Result DTO.

      • addSongsToLibrary

        Result addSongsToLibrary(String libraryId,
                         String biliSourceFavListId,
                         String songsIds,
                         List<BasicSong> songs,
                         List<BiliResource> resources,
                         Boolean isAddToPMSLibrary,
                         Boolean isFavoriteSearchedResource,
                         Integer platform)
        Add songs songsId to library libraryId in platform platform.
        Parameters:
        libraryId - Target library id.
        biliSourceFavListId - The source media id of fav list, only used in bilibili.
        songsIds - Songs' id, multiple songs id separated with comma.
        songs - The songs list to be added to library in pms.
        resources - The bilibili resources list to be added to library in pms.
        isAddToPMSLibrary - Whether adding songs to pms library.
        isFavoriteSearchedResource - Whether favorite searched resource.
        platform - Which platform the library belongs to.
        Returns:
        The response of request wrapped by Result DTO.

      • moveSongsToOtherLibrary

        Result moveSongsToOtherLibrary(String songsId,
                               String fromLibrary,
                               String toLibrary,
                               Integer platform)
        Move songs songsId from source library with fromLibrary to target library with toLibrary.
        Parameters:
        songsId - Songs id to be moved, multiple songs id separated with comma.
        fromLibrary - Source library's id.
        toLibrary - Target library's id.
        platform - Which platform these libraries belongs to.
        Returns:
        The response of request wrapped by Result DTO.

      • removeSongsFromLibrary

        Result removeSongsFromLibrary(String libraryId,
                              String songsId,
                              Integer platform)
        Remove songs songsId from library libraryId.
        Parameters:
        libraryId - Library's id.
        songsId - The songs' id, multiple songs id separated with comma.
        platform - a Integer object.
        Returns:
        The response of request wrapped by Result DTO.
